title: Don't Starve
textlong_fr: Don?t Starve est un jeu de survie intransigeant en zone sauvage plein d'art et de magie. Vous incarnez Wilson, un scientifique intrÇpide qui a ÇtÇ piÇgÇ par un dÇmon et transportÇ dans un mystÇrieux monde sauvage.
textlong_en: Don?t Starve is an uncompromising wilderness survival game full of science and magic. You play as Wilson, an intrepid Gentleman Scientist who has been trapped by a demon and transported to a mysterious wilderness world. Wilson must learn to exploit his environment and its inhabitants if he ever hopes to escape and find his way back home.

title: Daylight

textlong_en: You awake, trapped in an abandoned hospital. Your only source of light is your phone. You hit a dead-end and must turn around, but behind you lurks an eerie presence and strange noises... Experience Daylight, a procedurally generated psychological thriller for your PC.

title: Outlast
textlong_fr: Hell is an experiment you can't survive in Outlast, a first-person survival horror game developed by veterans of some of the biggest game franchises in history. As investigative journalist Miles Upshur, explore Mount Massive Asylum and try to survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.
textlong_en: Hell is an experiment you can't survive in Outlast, a first-person survival horror game developed by veterans of some of the biggest game franchises in history. As investigative journalist Miles Upshur, explore Mount Massive Asylum and try to survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

textlong_en: With FarSky, you take the role of Nathan who got lost in the Ocean after the crash of his submarine. You need to learn how to survive in the depths of the Ocean.

title: Rust
textlong_fr: Le seul but de Rust est de survivre. Pour ce faire, vous aurez besoin de surmonter les difficultÇs telles que la faim, la soif et le froid. Construire un feu. Construire un abri. Tuer des animaux pour la viande. ProtÇgez-vous contre d'autres joueurs. CrÇer des alliances avec d'autres acteurs et forment ensemble une ville. Tout ce qu'il faut pour survivre.
textlong_en: The only aim in Rust is to survive. To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals for meat. Protect yourself from other players. Create alliances with other players and together form a town. Whatever it takes to survive.

title: 7 Days to Die

textlong_en: Building on survivalist and horror themes, players in 7 Days to Die can scavenge the abandoned cities of the buildable and destructable voxel world for supplies or explore the wilderness to gather raw materials to build their own tools, weapons, traps, fortifications and shelters.

title: Minecraft
textlong_fr: Minecraft est un jeu de casser et plaáant des blocs. Au dÇbut, les gens ont construit des structures pour protÇger contre les monstres nocturnes, mais que le jeu a grandi joueurs ont travaillÇ ensemble pour crÇer de merveilleux, des choses imaginatives.
textlong_en: Minecraft is a game about breaking and placing blocks. At first, people built structures to protect against nocturnal monsters, but as the game grew players worked together to create wonderful, imaginative things.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero' - now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

textlong_en: Planet Explorers is an open world sandbox adventure RPG game set on a distant planet. The game uses a new OpenCL calculated voxel system to allow players to change the terrain in any way, create new objects such as weapons, vehicles, objects, and do it anywhere.

With dozens of cities to explore from the UK, Belgium, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, and many more, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.

title: Contagion
textlong_fr: Contagion n'est pas votre moyenne Zombie Shooter mais prend place une approche plus rÇaliste et diffÇrente dans le genre populaire avec des personnages uniques, environnements, armes, objets, et construit dans le systäme qui fait de chaque tour totalement imprÇvisible avec des ressources, des objectifs et des chemins jamais Çvolution.
textlong_en: Contagion isn't your average Zombie Shooter but instead takes a more realistic and different approach to the popular genre with unique characters, environments, weapons, items, and a built in system that makes every round completely unpredictable with resources, objectives, and paths ever changing.

title: Infestation: Survivor Stories

textlong_en: Infestation is a Survival Horror MMO that immerses players in a zombie-infested, post-apocalyptic world in which a viral outbreak has decimated the human population leaving in its wake, a nightmare of epic proportion.

textlong_en: Craft The World is a unique sandbox strategy game, the mix of Dungeon Keeper, Terraria and Dwarf Fortress. Explore a random generated world populated by dangerous creatures, build a dwarf fortress, gather resources, and craft all the items, weapons, and armor you need.

textlong_en: MAN MEETS MAGIC & MACHINE. The year is 2054. Magic has returned to the world, awakening powerful creatures of myth and legend. Technology merges with flesh and consciousness. Elves, trolls, orks and dwarves walk among us, while ruthless corporations bleed the world dry.

title: Super Meat Boy
textlong_fr: Le fameux jeu de plateforme arrive sur Steam avec un Head Crab jouable
textlong_en: The infamous, tough-as-nails platformer comes to Steam with a playable Head Crab character

title: Rogue Legacy

C'est OK, parce que personne n'est parfait, et vous n'avez pas Ö àtre parfait pour gagner ce match.
textlong_en: Rogue Legacy is a genealogical rogue-"LITE" where anyone can be a hero. Each time you die, your child will succeed you. Every child is unique. One child might be colorblind, another might have vertigo-- they could even be a dwarf. That's OK, because no one is perfect, and you don't have to be perfect to win this game.

textlong_en: Darkwood is a game about survival, exploration and fear set in mysterious woods somewhere in the territory of the Soviet Bloc. By blending RPG, roguelike and adventure elements together with a challenging difficulty, Darkwood aims to please players craving for a deep and rewarding experience.

textlong_en: Wolfenstein©: The New Order reignites the series that created the first-person shooter genre. Under development at Machine Games, a studio comprised of a seasoned group of developers recognized for their work creating story-driven games, Wolfenstein offers a deep game narrative packed with action, adventure and first-person combat.

textlong_en: Enter the mind of Howard Phillips, a young man who has developed an obsession with his dreams. Explore unique worlds filled with puzzles, secrets and horrors to find meaning in Howard?s directionless waking life.

textlong_en: Raise demons and spawn unholy weapons of war as a powerful Necromancer with an insatiable blood lust. Customize your minions to your liking and perfect your ideal "monster loadout." Tear your enemies limb from limb and harvest their corpses to strengthen your dark magics.

title: Tower Wars

textlong_en: Tower Wars combines elements of tower defense, RTS, and all-out multi-player mayhem to bring you a completely unique experience, delivered with a fun and funny not-so-old world style!

textlong_en: Endless Legend is a 4X turn-based fantasy strategy game by the creators of Endless Space and Dungeon of the Endless. Create your own Legend!

The adventure takes place in a primitive mysterious structure and the game mainly consists to explore and feel the deep and strong ambiance of this atemporal world but...

textlong_en: Prepare to experience the original man-on-the-run thriller in a completely new way. Be transported back to 1914 London, where Richard Hannay finds himself framed for a murder he didn't commit.

title: Brothers

textlong_en: Guide two brothers on an epic fairy tale journey from visionary Swedish film director, Josef Fares and top-tier developer Starbreeze Studios. Control both brothers at once as you experience co-op play in single player mode, like never before.

title: Braid

textlong_en: Braid is a puzzle-platformer, drawn in a painterly style, where you can manipulate the flow of time in strange and unusual ways. From a house in the city, journey to a series of worlds and solve puzzles to rescue an abducted princess.

title: Amnesia: The Dark Descent
textlong_fr: Votre dernier souvenir s'efface et disparaÓt dans les abysses. Il vous reste une impression : celle d'Ítre traquÈ. Il faut fuir. RÈveil... Amnesia: The Dark Descent un jeu d'horreur et de survie ‡ la premiËre personne. Une expÈrience qui va vous donner des sueurs froides. Un parcours cauchemardesque.
textlong_en: The last remaining memories fade away into darkness. Your mind is a mess and only a feeling of being hunted remains. You must escape. Awake... Amnesia: The Dark Descent, a first person survival horror. A game about immersion, discovery and living through a nightmare. An experience that will chill you to the core.

title: Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs

DÈcouvrez le nouveau jeu díhorreur ‡ la premiËre personne des auteurs díAmnesia: The Dark Descent et de Dear Esther, et plongez dans les profondeurs de la cupiditÈ, du pouvoir et de la folie.
textlong_en: This world is a Machine. A Machine for Pigs. Fit only for the slaughtering of Pigs. From the creators of Amnesia: The Dark Descent and Dear Esther comes a new first-person horrorgame that will drag you to the depths of greed, power and madness. It will bury its snout into your ribs and it will eat your heart.

title: Starbound
textlong_fr: Dans Starbound, vous prenez le rÙle d'un personnage qui vient fui leur planËte, pour crash-terre sur l'autre. De l‡, vous vous lancerez dans une quÍte pour survivre, dÈcouvrir, explorer et se frayer un chemin ‡ travers un univers infini.
textlong_en: In Starbound, you take on the role of a character whoís just fled from their home planet, only to crash-land on another. From there youíll embark on a quest to survive, discover, explore and fight your way across an infinite universe.

title: Terraria
textlong_fr: Creuser, survivre, explorer, construire ! Tout est possible dans ce jeu d'aventure bourrÈ d'action. Pack de 4 jeux Ègalement disponible !
textlong_en: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. Four Pack also available!

title: Project Zomboid
textlong_fr: Projet Zomboid est un bac ‡ sable infestÈ de zombies ouverte qui demande une simple question - comment allez-vous mourir?
textlong_en: Project Zomboid is an open-ended zombie-infested sandbox that asks one simple question ñ how will you die?

title: Caribbean!
textlong_fr: CaraÔbes! est un pirate sandbox RPG avec un accent plus important sur les batailles (‡ la fois sur terre et dans la mer) et de la gestion du caractËre de joueur et son Èquipage.
textlong_en: Caribbean! is a sandbox pirate RPG with a larger focus on battles (both on land and in the sea) and management of player's character and his crew.

title: Chivalry: Medieval Warfare
textlong_fr: AssiËgez des ch‚teaux et pillez des villages dans Chivalry: Medieval Warfare, un jeu de first person slasher mÈdiÈval au rythme rapide et axÈ sur des batailles en multijoueur
textlong_en: Besiege castles and raid villages in Chivalry: Medieval Warfare, a fast-paced medieval first person slasher with a focus on multiplayer battles

title: Perpetuum
textlong_fr: Perpetuum est un bac ‡ sable, serveur unique persistant, massivement multijoueur de science-fiction rpg (MMORPG). ContrÙler d'Ènormes robots et machines d'avoir accËs ‡ des ressources et des connaissances d'une planËte alien, amasser Ènorme richesse, ou mÍme rÈclamer une partie du monde pour vous-mÍme en utilisant la terraformation et une infrastructure complexe.
textlong_en: Perpetuum is a persistent, sandbox, single server, massively multiplayer sci-fi rpg (MMORPG). Control huge robots and mechs to gain access to an alien planet's resources and knowledge, amass huge wealth, or even claim part of the world for yourself using terraforming and complex infrastructure.

title: Papers, Please
textlong_fr: FÈlicitations. Le travail loterie Octobre est complet. Votre nom a ÈtÈ tirÈ. Pour le placement immÈdiat, rapport au MinistËre de l'admission ‡ la frontiËre Checkpoint Grestin. Un appartement sera fourni pour vous et votre famille dans l'Est Grestin. Attendez-vous ‡ un logement de classe 8.
textlong_en: Congratulations. The October labor lottery is complete. Your name was pulled. For immediate placement, report to the The Ministry of Admission at Grestin Border Checkpoint. An apartment will be provided for you and your family in East Grestin. Expect a Class-8 dwelling.

title: The Stanley Parable
textlong_fr: Le Stanley parabole est un jeu d'exploration ‡ la premiËre personne. Vous jouerez le rÙle de Stanley, et vous ne serez pas jouer comme Stanley. Vous allez suivre une histoire, vous ne serez pas suivre une histoire. Vous aurez le choix, vous n'aurez pas le choix. Le jeu se termine, le jeu ne finira jamais.
textlong_en: The Stanley Parable is a first person exploration game. You will play as Stanley, and you will not play as Stanley. You will follow a story, you will not follow a story. You will have a choice, you will have no choice. The game will end, the game will never end.

title: Insurgency
textlong_fr: Descendre dans la rue pour intense combat rapprochÈ, o˘ la survie d'une Èquipe dÈpend de la sÈcurisation des bastions essentiels et dÈtruire l'approvisionnement de l'ennemi dans ce mode multijoueur et coopÈratif Source Engine basÈ sur l'expÈrience.
textlong_en: Take to the streets for intense close quarters combat, where a team's survival depends upon securing crucial strongholds and destroying enemy supply in this multiplayer and cooperative Source Engine based experience.

title: RUNNING WITH RIFLES
textlong_fr: RUNNING WITH RIFLES est un jeu de tir tactique en vue de dessus incluant des ÈlÈments de RPG dans un monde ouvert. Dans RWR, vous rejoignez les rangs de l'armÈe en tant que soldat ordinaire, comme la plupart des milliers autour de vous.
textlong_en: RUNNING WITH RIFLES is a top-down tactical shooter with open world RPG elements. In RWR, you join the ranks of an army as a common soldier, just like the thousands around you.
